message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,150,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,050,000. I hope this aligns better with what you're willing to accept.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. However, the value of this product to me is significantly higher. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,125,000. This offer reflects the true worth of what I'm providing.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I've carefully considered your latest offer and while I understand the value you see in the product, I must stay within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $1,100,000. I hope this proposal will be more acceptable to you.
